RuleBusinessDescription: Gross Weight for ZFER is derived from Net Weight plus Packaging.  Gross weight should be between 100 - 120% of Net weight or the same.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Gross weight (BGREW) should be equal or bigger than 100% of Nett weight (NTGEW) and smaller than 120%.

RuleBusinessDescription: Gross Weight for ZHAW is derived from Net Weight plus Packaging.  Gross weight should be between 100 - 120% of Net weight or the same.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Gross weight (BGREW) should be equal or bigger than 100% of Nett weight (NTGEW) and smaller than 120%.

RuleBusinessDescription: Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZERS materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZERS), then MAKT-MAKTX (language specific i.e IN combination with SPRAS) is not existing already in MAKT

RuleBusinessDescription: Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZFER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZFER), then MAKT-MAKTX (language specific i.e IN combination with SPRAS) is not existing already in MAKT

RuleBusinessDescription: Check on duplicate names/descriptions of ZROH materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZROH), then MAKT-MAKTX (language specific i.e IN combination with SPRAS) is not existing already in MAKT

RuleBusinessDescription: Materials that have sales views need an entry in Account Assignment Group MVKE-KTGRM. Excluded Materal type ZTXT
RuleTechnicalDefinition: For a specific Material no, If Maintenance status (MSTA-STATM) = V (i.e. Sales View Exits),  fetch the   Material (MATNR) & Sales Org (VKORG)& Ditrbution Channel (VTWEG) combination from the table MSTA, then in Table MVKE check for the same combination whether  (MVKE-KTGRM)  ≠ Null. Excluded Materal type = ZTXT.

RuleBusinessDescription: Materials with procurement type F AND X needs purchasing view
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARC-BESKZ) = F and X, for a specifc Material (MATNR) , then fetch the MATNR & Plant (WERKS) combination from MARC, then for the same MATNR & WERKS combination,  Maintenance status (MSTA-PSTAT) = E, in table MSTA.

RuleBusinessDescription: For FERT Materials, Processing time for goods receipt in days is always 'empty'  in Production plants. Excluding Aerospace FERT materials (see remarks) - When description starts with AER or Brand is ANA
RuleTechnicalDefinition: For FERT Materials, If Procurement Type (MARC-BESKZ) = 'E' (In-House Production) and (MARC-SOBSL)=Null for a Material (MATNR) & PLANT (WERKS) combination, then  for the same combination (MARC-WEBAZ) = Null or 0
FieldNameChecked: Processing time for goods receipt in days

RuleBusinessDescription: If X-Plant material status is 70 (deactivated), MRP Type should be ND (no planning) in all Plants
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MSTAE= 70)  then (MARC-DISMM) = ND

RuleBusinessDescription: Industry sector is always A (Plant engin./construction) for all material types
RuleTechnicalDefinition: For all Material (MATNR),  (MARA-MBRSH) = A

RuleBusinessDescription: Weight Unit for ZFER materials is always KG (Kilogram)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZFER), then (MARA-GEWEI)  = KG

RuleBusinessDescription: Transportation group is always 0001 for ZFER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZFER), then (MARA-TRAGR)  = 0001

RuleBusinessDescription: Transportation group is always 0001 for ZHAL materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAL), then (MARA-TRAGR)  = 0001

RuleBusinessDescription: Transportation group is always 0001 for ZHAW materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART=  ZHAW), then (MARA-TRAGR)  = 0001

RuleBusinessDescription: Transportation group is always 0001 for ZVER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZVER), then (MARA-TRAGR)  = 0001

RuleBusinessDescription: Transportation group is always 0001 for ZROH materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZROH), then (MARA-TRAGR)  = 0001

RuleBusinessDescription: If Batch Management is marked then Shelf Life data has to be maintained. Check for ZFERs, ZHALs and ZROHs.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARC-XCHPF) = 'X' then: (MARA-MHDRZ) ≠ Null (MARA-MHDHB) ≠ Null (MARA-IPRKZ) = 'D' (D=Day) [ in background technically D is blank] (MARA-RDMHD) = 'BLANK'   If (MARC-XCHPF) = 'X' then: (MARA-MHDRZ) ≠ Null (MARA-MHDHB) ≠ Null (MARA-IPRKZ) = 'M' (M=Month) (MARA-RDMHD) = '+'
FieldNameChecked: Minimum Remaining Shelf Life (MARA-MHDRZ) & Total Shelf Life (MARA-MHDHB)

RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZKMA) and (MARA-MTPOS=0002 or MARA-MTPOS=Y002) , then (MARA-KZKFG) = 'X'
If (MARA-MTART= ZKMB) and (MARA-MTPOS=0002 or MARA-MTPOS=Y002) , then (MARA-KZKFG) = 'X'
If (MARA-MTART= FERT) and (MARA-MTPOS=0002) , then (MARA-SATNR) = (MARA-MATNR)

RuleBusinessDescription: For ZFER produced in a Plant, Country of Origin is the Country of the Plant (except when it's pushed)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZFER) and (MARC-BESKZ = E) then (MARC-HERKL) = first two digits of (MARC-WERKS) AND special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL) is empty

RuleBusinessDescription: For procured Material this indicator has to be unmarked (regardless of Material Type) To be confirmed
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If  (MARC-BESKZ = F) then (MARC-KORDB) = ' '  MARC maintenance status should contain 'E' (Purchasing view)

RuleBusinessDescription: For procured Material this indicator has to be marked (regardless of Material Type)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If  (MARC-BESKZ = F) then (MARC-KAUTB) = 'X'  MARC maintenance status should contain 'E' (Purchasing view)

RuleBusinessDescription: Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZFER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Only check when Sales Org view is created

RuleBusinessDescription: Commodity codes (MARC-STAWN) should not be empty.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZFER)
FieldNameChecked: Commodity code for ZFER should not be empty

RuleBusinessDescription: Commodity codes (MARC-STAWN) should not be empty.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAW)
FieldNameChecked: Commodity code for ZHAW should not be empty

RuleBusinessDescription: if MVKE-LVORM is marked for all active sales org's and if MARC-LVORM for all active plants is marked as well, but there is NO block on MARA-LVORM, then give result
RuleTechnicalDefinition: if MVKE-LVORM is marked for all active sales org's and if MARC-LVORM for all active plants is marked as well, but there is NO block on MARA-LVORM, then give result.
FieldNameChecked: All deleted materials on plant and sales org level should have a central block

RuleBusinessDescription: X-plant material status (MARA-MSTAE) is 70 for all materials marked for deletion.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-LVORM)= X, then (MARA-MSTAE)= 70 & (MARA-MAKTX) should start with String DEL or DUP
FieldNameChecked: All deleted materials should have X-plant material status  (MARA-MSTAE) 70 (Deactivated) and have DEL or DUP at the start of the material description

RuleBusinessDescription: For ZHAW materials the Country of Origin should be identical in all active Plants
RuleTechnicalDefinition: IF (MARA-MTART)=HAWA, then (MARC-HERKL) is Identical  for all Plants.

RuleBusinessDescription: For ZHAW materials the first 6 digits of the Commodity code should be identical in all active Plants
Default Standard Price field to 1 in case of Manufacturing and Mixing sites. Whatever is copied will be replaced by 1 and new creates will default to 1
RuleTechnicalDefinition: IF (MARA-MTART)=FERT, then (MBEW-STPRS)=1 for all Manufacturing and Mixing sites. [Applicable only for 'Create' Scenarios including Copy with Reference]

RuleBusinessDescription: ZHAW materials always have Procurement type F maintained. Only If the 'special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL)' is used, then the procurement key should be 'E'
VERP materials always have Procurement type F maintained. Only If the 'special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL)' is used, then the procurement key should be 'E'
General Item Category Group is always NORM for ZROH materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZROH) then (MARA-MTPOS = NORM

RuleBusinessDescription: General Item Category Group is always 0002 for Configurable  materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZKMA) then (MARA-MTPOS = 0002)

RuleBusinessDescription: General Item Category Group is always LEIS for ZSER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZSER) then (MARA-MTPOS) = LEIS

RuleBusinessDescription: Material Account Assignment Group is always 01 for ZHAW materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAW) then MVKE-KTGRM = 01)

RuleBusinessDescription: Material-related origin is always checked in Production Plants for ZROH materials
Material-related origin is always checked in Production Plants for ZHAL materials
Material-related origin is always checked in Production Plants for ZFER materials
Material Price Determination is always 3 for FERT, HAWA, HALB, ROH, HIBE, VERP materials in Production Plants (ML active)
Material Price Determination is always 2 for all material types except FERT, HAWA, HALB, ROH, HIBE, VERP materials in Production Plants (ML active)
Material Price Determination is always blank for all materials in non-production sites (ML not active)
Material should have an assignment to at least 1 Plant and/or Sales Org
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Sales Org / Plant assignment

RuleBusinessDescription: If Procurement type is F then MRP group need to be filled
All materials on NON production sites should have Price Control V
Material Is always Costed with Quantity Structure in Production Plants
Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZHAW materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Only check when Sales Org view is created

RuleBusinessDescription: Cash Discount indicator is always checked for ZVER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Only check when Sales Org view is created

RuleBusinessDescription: Check for duplicate materials based on unique Manufacturer Part Number across all buying material types
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAW), then (MARA-MFRPN) should be Unique (Should not be already existing in the MARA Table entries).

RuleBusinessDescription: Check for duplicate materials based on unique Manufacturer Part Number across all buying material types
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZVER), then (MARA-MFRPN) should be Unique (Should not be already existing in the MARA Table entries).

RuleBusinessDescription: Division is always empty for all material types in UNICA when Sales View is created
RuleTechnicalDefinition: For all Material (MATNR),  (MARA-SPART) = ' '

RuleBusinessDescription: If Special Procurement Costing (MARC-SOBSK) has a Z value, the Costing Overhead Group (MBEW-KOSGR) need an entry with the Plant code (XX01)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If Special Procurement Costing (MARC-SOBSK) has a Z value, the Costing Overhead Group (MBEW-KOSGR) need an entry with the Plant code (XX01)

RuleBusinessDescription: IP vendors (account group Y005) should have NO assignment to a Company Code
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (LFA1-LIFNR = IP*) & (LFA1-KTOKK) = Y005,  then no data on table LFB1 should exist for that specific vendor (LIFNR).

RuleBusinessDescription: Standard duplicate check on 3rd Party Business Partners  (Address)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Use std Checks that’s already available

RuleBusinessDescription: Each Ship-To customer (account group Y002) must be assigned to at least 1 Sold-To customer.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: A ship to Customer (Y002) needs to be assigned somewhere under a Sold to Customer record - Y0001(Partner Function - SH).Purpose is to find all free floating ship to customers which remain unassigned !

RuleBusinessDescription: BP's with country code US, BR & CA need tax jurisdiction maintained in general data
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (KNA1-KTOKD) ≠ Y006 or Y009 & (KNA1-LAND1) = US or CA, then Field (KNA1-TXJCD) ≠ Null

RuleBusinessDescription: All IC vendors in Europe must have Payment term L017 as agreed Leviat intercompany term in both purchasing and company code view, else L020
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (LFA1-LIFNR = IC*) &If (LFA1-KTOKK) =Y005, then LFB1-ZTERM and LFM1-ZTERM should be equal to L017

RuleBusinessDescription: All IC customers in Europe must have Payment term L017 as agreed Leviat intercompany term in both sales and company code view, else L020
If country of origin is not equal to country of the company code then Cash Management group is A2 and else A1
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Vendor Account Group Y001

RuleBusinessDescription: Check on EU Business Partners without VAT number maintained
Italian Business Partners with Natural Person indicator should have Tax code 1 maintained (excluding Employee vendors)
Check if email is entered in correct format in all BP groups
RuleTechnicalDefinition: (ADRC-FLAGCOMM6) Should include @ and .

RuleBusinessDescription: When Title Mr. or Mrs. is used, the gender of the employee cannot be Unknown
RuleTechnicalDefinition: HR Title (Q0002-ANREX) BP Title (BUS000FLDS-TITLE_MEDI)

RuleBusinessDescription: Material-related origin is always checked, materal type ZNLA excluded
RuleTechnicalDefinition: (MBEW-HKMAT) = X, Materal type <> ZNLA

RuleBusinessDescription: For Packaging materials the MRP Type is V1 if a reorder point is defined. If reorder point is 0 then the MRP Type is PD
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZVER) AND (MARC-MINBE ≠ 0) then (MARC-DISMM) = V1

RuleBusinessDescription: ZHAW materials always have Procurement type F maintained. Only If the “special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL)” is used, than the procurement type should be E
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAW) then (MARC-BESKZ = F, unless (MARC-SOBSL) ≠ Null

RuleBusinessDescription: Packaging materials always have Procurement type F maintained. Only If the “special procurement key (MARC-SOBSL)” is used, than the procurement key should be E
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZVER) then (MARC-BESKZ = F, unless (MARC-SOBSL) ≠ Null

RuleBusinessDescription: Puchasing value key is Z1 for Raw materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZROH), then (MARA-EKWSL) = Z1

RuleBusinessDescription: Puchasing value key is Z1 for Trade goods
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZHAW), then (MARA-EKWSL) = Z1

RuleBusinessDescription: Item Category Group is always NORM for ZROH materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZROH) then (MVKE-MTPOS = NORM

RuleBusinessDescription: If X-Plant material status is 70 (deactivated), Do Not Cost indicator should be set in all Plants
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MSTAE= 70)  then  (MARC-NCOST) = X

RuleBusinessDescription: Has an entry only when MRP Type is V1 and Planning time fence is maintained
RuleTechnicalDefinition: MARC-MINBE has value when (MARC-DISMM = V1) AND (MARC-FXHOR) has not a value 000

RuleBusinessDescription: Packaging Material Type is ZMT1 for ZVER materials
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (MARA-MTART= ZVER), then (MARA-VHART) = ZMT1

RuleBusinessDescription: Search Term 1 of 3rd Party and Ship-To BP's should have format: first 5 characters of the name_first 5 characters of the city (skipping special characters and spaces)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (BUT000-BU_GROUP) = Z001 or Z002, then (BUT000-BU_SORT1) = First 5 Characters of (BUT000-NAME_ORG1)_First 5 Characters of (ADRC_CITY1)

RuleBusinessDescription: IP vendors should have NO assignment to a Company Code
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (LFA1-LIFNR = IP*) & (LFA1-KTOKK) = Z099,  then no data on table LFB1 should exist for that specific vendor (LIFNR).

RuleBusinessDescription: Search for similar name data
RuleTechnicalDefinition: BUT000- NAME_ORG1  ≠ BUT000- NAME_ORG1  (existing table values)

RuleBusinessDescription: Search for identical bank account data (Combination of Bank Country, Bank Key & Bank Acc or IBAN)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: (BUT0BK-BANKS + BUT0BK-BANKL + BUT0BK-BANKN) ≠ (BUT0BK-BANKS + BUT0BK-BANKL + BUT0BK-BANKN) Or TIBAN  (existing table values)

RuleBusinessDescription: Vendor company code payment terms and purchase organization payment terms should be identical
RuleTechnicalDefinition: LFB1-ZTERM = LFM1-ZTERM

RuleBusinessDescription: List discrepancies between different purchase organization payment terms for the same vendor.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: (LFM1-ZTERM) value should be same for a Vendor (LIFNR) across all EKORG

RuleBusinessDescription: Customer company code payment terms and Sales Org. payment terms are identical
RuleTechnicalDefinition: KNB1-ZTERM = KNVV-ZTERM

RuleBusinessDescription: List discrepancies between different sales organization payment terms for the same customer.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: (KNVV-ZTERM) for a Customer (KUNNR) should be same for all VKORG.
FieldNameChecked: Payment Terms for diff. Sales Org (VKORG)

RuleBusinessDescription: Each Ship-To customer (account group Z002) must be assigned to at least 1 Sold-To customer.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: A ship to Customer (KNA1-KTOKD=Z002) needs to be assigned somewhere under a Sold to Customer record - Z001(Partner Function - SH in table KNVP).Purpose is to find all free floating ship to customers which remain unassigned !

RuleBusinessDescription: Each Sold-To and Ship-To customer (account groups Y001 and Y002) should be assigned to at least 1 Sales Organisation
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (KNA1-KTOKD) = Y001 or Y002, then (KNA1-KUNNR) should have at least one entry for field VKORG in table KNVV.

RuleBusinessDescription: Customer record with account group Y002 (Ship-To) should not have Company Code data
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If (KNA1-KTOKD) = Y002, then customer (KUNNR) should not have any entry in table KNB1

RuleBusinessDescription: Search for identical tax / VAT numbers
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Combination DFKKBPTAXNUM-TAXTYPE and DFKKBPTAXNUM-TAXNUM is not maintained more than once

RuleBusinessDescription: Search for identical telephone numbers
RuleTechnicalDefinition: ADRC-TEL_NUMBER ≠ ADRC-TEL_NUMBER (existing table values)

RuleBusinessDescription: LFM1-KALSK should be filled with code TP (external vendor pricing)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Vendor Group for calculation schema should be filled with External vendor Pricing - LFM1-KALSK = TP

RuleBusinessDescription: If country of origin is not equal to country of the company code then Cash Management group is A2 and else A1
RuleTechnicalDefinition: When Vendor Account Group (LFA1-KTOKK) = Z001, LFB1-FDGRV = A1 for domestic vendors and A2 for foreign vendors (compare ADRC-Country with Company Code country / coding)

RuleBusinessDescription: Check if used payment term is a Leviat payment term
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Only payment terms starting with L are allowed

RuleBusinessDescription: Check if used payment term is a Leviat payment term
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Only payment terms starting with L are allowed

RuleBusinessDescription: For customers located in Brazil the district is a required field.
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If customer in located in country:  Brazil (BR), the district (ADDR1_DATA-CITY2) cannot be empty

RuleBusinessDescription: If country of customer is US, CA, BR, MX, AU, IT, IE or GB the regions field should have a value (part of address print)
RuleTechnicalDefinition: If ADRC-COUNTRY = US, CA, BR, MX, AU, IT, IE or GB then ADRC-REGION is not empty

RuleBusinessDescription: if KNB1-LVORM is marked for all active company codes and if KNVV-LVORM for all active sales org's is marked as well, but there is NO block on KNA1-LVORM, then give result.
FieldNameChecked: All deleted customers on company code and sales org level should have a central block

RuleBusinessDescription: if LFB1-LVORM is marked for all active company codes and if LFM1-LVORM for all active purchase org's is marked as well, but there is NO block on LFA1-LVORM, then give result.
FieldNameChecked: All deleted vendors on company code and purchase org level should have a central block

RuleBusinessDescription: If country of origin is not equal to country of the company code then Cash Management group is E3, else E2
All Intercompany customers have cash management group E4 maintained
RuleTechnicalDefinition: When KNA1-KTOKD = Y099, KNB1-FDGRC should be E4

RuleBusinessDescription: Business Partners with central deletion flag should have DELETED, DUPLICATE, MERGED, CLOSED in Search Term 1
RuleTechnicalDefinition: BUT000-BU_SORT1 should be DELETED or DUPLICATE or MERGED or CLOSED when BUT000-XDELE is checked

RuleBusinessDescription: BP's without bank account data while all possible payment methods require a bank account
RuleTechnicalDefinition: No entry in BUT0BK, while LFB1-ZWELS have an entry

RuleBusinessDescription: BP's without bank account data while all possible payment methods require a bank account
RuleTechnicalDefinition: No entry in BUT0BK, while KNB1-ZWELS have an entry

RuleBusinessDescription: Field Collect. auth. marked when bank account then payment method F
RuleTechnicalDefinition: BUT0BK-XEZER is checked with KNB1-ZWELS = F

RuleBusinessDescription: This checkbox should be defaulted marked in each Sales Org
RuleTechnicalDefinition: KNVV-BOKRE

RuleBusinessDescription: BP's with Account Group Z008 should be created only with User ID = BP_SYNC
RuleTechnicalDefinition: Table BUT000-PARTNER: when BU_GROUP = Z008 then CRUSR = BP_SYNC else Error
